author: Jacob Kienlen
description: An early Prime Day treat for avid readers.
title: The Amazon Kindle Unlimited Deal Is Incredible If You Like LitRPG Books

author: Kevin Lee
description: Upgrade your Steam Deck with these accessories including cases, memory cards, and more.
title: The Most Essential Steam Deck Accessories to Buy in 2025

author: Michael Higham
description: The Nintendo Camera is the most convenient way to take advantage of Switch 2’s novel GameChat feature, but the value proposition isn't quite there.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Camera Review

author: Eric Song
description: The Nintendo Switch 2 release does not make the original model irrelevant.
title: New Nintendo Switch OLED Consoles Go on Sale at AliExpress as the Switch 2 Takes Off

author: Erik Adams
description: As potent and timely an exploration of cultural strife as the original, and Danny Boyle and Alex Garland tug at the heartstrings with bloody, deadly skill.
title: 28 Years Later Review

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers sets itself apart from the jump with its unique art and setting. It takes place in the land of Shu during the latter part of the Ming Dynasty. That single choice sets what I played of Wuchang apart from just about every other soulslike.
title: Wuchang Fallen Feathers Is a Soulslike with a Unique Look and a Neat Hook

author: Scott Collura
description: From 28 Days Later to Trainspotting to Sunshine and beyond, what is the best Danny Boyle movie?
title: Ranking Danny Boyle's Movies

author: Erik Adams
description: Having none of the care and consideration that its title would suggest, Patience crashes and burns in its attempt to try something different in the detective genre.
title: Patience Review

author: Eric Song
description: Also features a fast 22.5W charging rate over USB Type-C.
title: This $12 Iniu 10,000mAh Power Bank Will More than Double Your Nintendo Switch 2 Playtime

author: Chris Reed
description: Tomb Raider: The Crypt of Chronos is an upcoming board game that lets you play through treasure hunting adventures either solo or with friends.
title: How Tomb Raider: The Crypt of Chronos Board Game Came to Be

author: Lloyd Coombes
description: Several unloved Magic; The Gathering cards have experience up to a 2800% spike in value thanks to the new Final Fantasy x MTG Universes Beyond release.
title: These MTG Cards Have Spiked by Up to 2800% Thanks to New Final Fantasy Synergies

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: Fathom Entertainment and Dark Sky Films have designated August 18, 2025 as Texas Chain Saw Day, a nationwide theatrical celebration honoring the iconic and influential horror film, The Texas Chain Saw Massacre.
title: Texas Chain Saw Day: The 1974 Horror Classic Coming Back to Theaters (and in 4K) for One Night Only

author: Christian Wait
description: As of June 17, Kirby and Donkey Kong Bananza preorders are live for Switch 2. Get deals on MacBook Air M3 for $699, the Samsung Neo G9 for $1549.99, and more.
title: Deals for Today: Kirby, Donkey Kong, and Big Tech Discounts

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Florence Pugh has revealed Marvel shot a fake Thunderbolts* ending scene in secret that included a title that wasn’t The New Avengers.
title: Marvel Shot a Fake Thunderbolts* Ending Scene That Included a Title That Wasn't The New Avengers to Keep the Reveal a Secret

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Some of the top artists in the industry are lending their take to the Dark Knight's new costume, as DC reveals the gorgeous variant covers for September's Batman #1.
title: DC Reveals 'Blind as a Bat' Promotion for Batman #1 Relaunch

author: Tom Phillips
description: Weeks ahead of The Fantastic Four: First Steps releasing in cinemas, fans have their first look at classic villain Giganto — via a commercial for Little Caesars pizza.
title: Did Our First Look at Classic Fantastic Four Villain Giganto in the MCU Really Just Come From a Pizza Commercial?

author: Eric Van Allen
description: Elden Ring Nightreign's status as a co-op PvE excursion introduced a fresh mechanic for previously solo players in revives. Those who fall in battle hit the ground and can get picked back up, if their teammates wail on them hard enough to knock out the purple bars of their circular dial.
title: Turns Out Elden Ring Nightreign's Revive Bars Have Some Hidden Mechanics That Make Them Increasingly More Difficult To Whittle Down

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Are you ready to return? We finally have a release date for the upcoming sequel film Return to Silent Hill — which means we’re just one step closer to getting back to the town that started it all for many horror and gaming fans.
title: Silent Hill Sequel Film Return To Silent Hill Finally Gets a Release Date

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: We've got an exclusive preview of Conan: Scourge of the Serpent #1, the first chapter in Titan Comics' latest sword-and-sorcery epic.
title: Conan: Scourge of the Serpent Kicks Off a New Barbarian Epic

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Get your first look at Bleak Haven, a new first-person survival horror game whose creator says is heavily inspired by the Resident Evil series as well as The Ritual. It's a story-driven, cinematic single-player experience with puzzles, weapon crafting, and brutal combat.
title: First-Person Survival Horror Game 'Bleak Haven' Announced for PC

author: Matthew Adler
description: One of the best options for streaming live sports is Hulu + Live TV. It combines everything from the standard Hulu subscription with a wide range of live channels, including major sporting events like the NBA Finals, along with popular entertainment and news.
title: The NBA Finals Are the Perfect Excuse to Try Hulu + Live TV’s Free Trial

author: Tom Phillips
description: American rock band Alien Ant Farm have said it was a "bummer" not to be included in the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3+4 soundtrack, after their track Wish originally featured in the series' fourth game.
title: 'A Bummer We Weren't Invited,' Says Alien Ant Farm After Being Cut From Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3+4 Soundtrack — 'I Feel Like Our Song Was Really Good'

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: Here's how to play all of the FNAF games in timeline order before Secret of the Mimic arrives this summer.
title: How to Play the Five Nights at Freddy's Games in Chronological Order

author: Eric Van Allen
description: Elden Ring Nightreign Patch 1.01.3 is live now on all platforms, and while it just hits a few distinct bullet points for tuning and bug fixing, players seem appreciative of the changes that have been made. Check out the patch notes.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Patch 1.01.3 Adds a Little Bit of Madness, But Players Are Really Happy About One Bug Fix

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Adventure of Samsara, the modern revival of the Atari 2600's classic Adventure, is a metroidvania with soulslike elements (resting at golden anvils restores your healing flasks and respawns enemies). I know, I know, both genres are a bit crowded. But hear me out. This actually works pretty well!
title: Atari’s Classic Adventure Is Back as Adventure of Samsara, and It’s a Metroidvania

author: Jordan Sirani
description: Wondering how to watch the Pirates of the Caribbean movies in order? We're here to help with a breakdown of Disney's swashbuckling chronology.
title: How to Watch the Pirates of the Caribbean Movies in Chronological Order

author: Ben Williams
description: You can get early access to Pokémon TCG’s Black Bolt & White Flare sets with a paid Walmart+ membership, here's how to preorder and unlock exclusive member perks.
title: Walmart+ Members Get Early Access to Preorder Pokémon TCG's Upcoming Expansions Black Bolt & White Flare

author: Erik Adams
description: All You Need Is Kill delivers a spectacular and heartfelt reimagining of the light novel of the same name.
title: All You Need Is Kill Review

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Dune 3 has reportedly cast two roles that will come as no surprise to fans of Frank Herbert’s sprawling science fiction book series, but their confirmation veers into potential spoiler territory for others.
title: Dune 3 Casts Jason Momoa’s Son in One of Two Newly Confirmed Roles That Won’t Come as Any Surprise to Fans of the Books, but Could Be Spoiler Territory for Others

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Relooted puts the player in control of a team of Robin Hood-like thieves that have dedicated their talents to the cause of reuniting items of cultural significance with their home countries. The group gets together upon discovering that a museum is hiding their ownership of multiple antiques in a vault, not even providing a reasoning of public education, but opening them up to having nowhere to report a theft.
title: Relooted Is an Historical Heist with Cultural Weight Behind It

author: Tom Phillips
description: Donkey Kong Bananza has confirmed that the previously-leaked Pauline will be your sidekick character in the game.
title: Donkey Kong Bananza Confirms Super Mario Odyssey's Pauline Is Your New Sidekick — and DK Can Now Transform Into a Zebra or Flying Ostrich

author: Matthew Adler
description: Prices are on the rise.
title: These Are the Gaming Accessories Worth Buying Before Tariffs Kick In Again

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: With Borderlands 4, the team at Gearbox seems eager to take some big swings in hopes of reclaiming the throne of firearms and shell casings they themselves built, and whether it’s the greatly improved shooting mechanics, an interesting revamp to RPG mechanics, an entirely fresh setting, a slew of new characters, or a more grounded tone in its story, the handful of hours I played left me fairly confident that I will find myself pulled back into this wonderfully weird world of psychopaths and extremely irritating robots.
title: Borderlands 4 Sets Its Sights on Reclaiming the Looter Shooter Throne

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: At long last, Spider-Man: The Animated Series fans will get resolution to that agonizing cliffhanger ending. Find out what to expect from Marvel's sequel comic Spider-Man '94.
title: Marvel's Spider-Man '94 Comic to Continue the Fan-Favorite Animated Series

author: Bo Moore
description: It’s not perfect, but with its new Intel HX-series processor and RTX 5090, the MSI Titan 18 HX AI slays.
title: MSI Titan 18 HX AI Review

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: A poster for Predator: Badlands released ahead of San Diego Comic-Con 2025 has revealed a first proper look at the new Predator's armor and mask, what is perhaps an Aliens reference — and might even contain a spoiler for the film.
title: Predator: Badlands Poster Breaks Cover, Reveals First Proper Look at New Predator's Armor and Mask — and Also Maybe a Big Spoiler

author: Tom Phillips
description: Pokémon Go will continue its summer events plan by driving a big red truck around seven cities in Europe, beginning in the UK next month.
title: Pokémon Go Details Summer City Events Featuring a Big Red Truck its Driving Round Europe

author: Robert Anderson
description: There's already stuff on sale ahead of Amazon's longest ever Prime Day July event.
title: Here's The 10 Best Prime Day 2025 Deals That You Can Already Shop

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: James Gunn has moved to clarify comments he made in a recent interview where he said Disney “killed” Marvel by demanding an increased output for the Disney+ streaming platform.
title: Marvel Was 'Screwed' by Disney's 'Sacrifice-Everything-for-Streaming Craze,' James Gunn Says, but 'They're on the Other Side of That Now'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Remember when retail giant GameStop ruined the launch of Switch 2 for hundreds of customers by stapling receipts through the screens of Nintendo's new console?
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Retailer GameStop Is Really Leaning Into Its Launch Day Stapler Snafu

author: Matt Purslow
description: Help us rank the biggest and best gaming reveals from the summer showcases.
title: Help Us Rank the Biggest Games From Summer of Gaming

author: Tom Phillips
description: Disney has hidden a sneaky hint to the real villain of upcoming Black Panther spin-off series Ironheart in the show's episode schedule, fans believe.
title: Disney's Ironheart Episode Schedule Hides Mephisto Tease, Fans Believe, Including When Borat Actor Sacha Baron Cohen Will Make His Top-Secret Marvel Debut

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has issued an update to Mario Kart World that fixes a number of in-game issues, including instances where the game would crash. Check out the update 1.1.1 patch notes.
title: Mario Kart World's 1.1.1 Update Is Here — Check Out the Patch Notes

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: We've got an exclusive first look at three of Mattel's exclusive toys for San Diego Comic-Con 2025, including Mario Kart's Pauline and a Monster High Elvira doll.
title: Mattel Brings Mario Kart's Pauline and Elvira to San Diego Comic-Con 2025

author: Robert Anderson
description: Amazon has Nintendo Switch 2 consoles back in stock today in the UK.
title: Amazon Just Restocked Nintendo Switch 2 Consoles in the UK, Act Fast To Secure Yours

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nearly 3,000 Switch 2 consoles worth $1.4 million have been reported stolen from a truck transporting stock between Nintendo of America's headquarters and a Texas GameStop store.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Consoles Worth $1.4 million Stolen in Brazen GameStop Truck Heist

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Director of the upcoming Elden Ring Movie, Alex Garland, is on his seventh playthrough of FromSoftware's epic fantasy RPG, and has revealed the boss he found the toughest to take down.
title: Elden Ring Movie Director Alex Garland Is on His 7th Playthrough of the Game, Reveals His Toughest Boss

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: If you’re making a Terminator video game, you ideally want to be able to include Arnold Schwarzenegger in all his glory. That, however, isn’t always possible. Why? The developer of an upcoming Terminator video game has offered an explanation.
title: Maker of New Terminator 2 Video Game Tracked Down Actor Who Played Future War John Connor Back in 1991 to Include His Likeness

author: Eric Van Allen
description: Relics are the potent items that can give your Nightfarer an extra boost on every run of Elden Ring Nightreign. There is also, as it turns out, a limit on just how many you can have stored up in your hideaway.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Player Discovers There's a Maximum Number of Relics You Can Store

author: Adam Mathew
description: No matter your console of choice, there’s something here worth adding to cart before the savings vanish.
title: AU Deals: Amazon Freebies and a Slew of New Lowest Ever Prices on the Hottest Games Actually Worth Owning!

author: Myles Obenza
description: We recently covered Amazon's massive sale on Magic: The Gathering Aetherdrift sealed booster sets, so here are the most valuable cards to chase when ripping open packs from the racing-themed set right now.
title: Here's the 10 Most Valuable Aetherdrift Cards to Chase During Amazon's Magic: The Gathering Sale
